name: restify
description: REST framework specifically meant for web service APIs
author: Mark Cavage <mcavage@gmail.com> (http://www.joyent.com)

scripts.pretest: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint lib tst && which gjslint; if [[ "$?" = 0 ]] ; then  gjslint --nojsdoc -r . -x lib/sprintf.js -e node_modules; else echo "Missing gjslint. Skipping lint"; fi
